text: "Private Investigations" is a 1982 song by British rock band Dire Straits. It is the leading single to their fourth studio album Love over Gold. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom and Ireland, number 1 in the Netherlands and Belgium, number 21 in Australia, number 20 in Finland, number 19 in Austria and number 16 in New Zealand. ==References== Category:1982 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Progressive rock songs Category:Dire Straits songs
title: Private Investigations
